title: Night ferry
creator_credit: David Eady, Eady-Barnes Productions and CFF Productions
brief_description: Childrens mystery adventure film about the son of a cafe owner who investigates the theft of an Egyptian mummy. Cast includes Bernard Cribbins, Graham Fletcher, Jayne Tottman, Engin Ashref, Carol Rousseau, Aubrey Morris.
